tool_description: This is the API for Spont Horeca. When you are a Spont user, you can request for an API KEY and your Company ID

api_list.name: webhookList
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://134.p.rapidapi.com/webhook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "134.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: productList

optional_parameters.name: nextPageKey
optional_parameters.description: This is used for pagination and can be found in every reponse. Add this value to get the next set of products

api_list.name: getCategoryById

required_parameters.name: categoryID
required_parameters.description: The category id you want to retrieve

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://134.p.rapidapi.com/category/string"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "134.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: orderList

optional_parameters.name: nextPageKey
optional_parameters.description: The nextPageKey is returned with every response and can be included to get the next set of orders sorted by date.

api_list.name: getOrderById

required_parameters.name: orderID
required_parameters.description: The order id, please note this is not the Order Number
